DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate effect treatment Micardis® MicardisPlus® blood pressure . Secondary objective effect Micardis® / MicardisPlus® metabolic parameter ( triglyceride , cholesterol , LDL blood glucose , insulin Homeostasis Model Assessment ( HOMA ) -index HbA1c ) patient essential hypertension diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Treatment With Micardis® MicardisPlus® Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Hypertension Diabetes mellitus Age < 18 year
